pages.text: The Rune of Unleashed Nature is a hybrid altar rune that bridges the gap between Blood Magic and Botania, channeling raw mana energy to enhance the Blood Altar's capabilities. When powered by Botania's mana network, this rune provides exceptional bonuses that make it one of the most powerful altar enhancements available.

Crafted using $(item)Blank Rune$() at the center, any $(item)Stone$() in corners, $(item)Imbued Slate$() at the bottom, and $(item)Manasteel Ingots$() in the remaining slots. This fuses Blood Magic and Botania into a powerful hybrid rune.

Place this rune as part of your Blood Altar structure. It can receive mana from Botania sparks and stores up to 5000 mana internally.$(br2)$(blood)Always Active:$()$(br)• Capacity bonus (increases LP storage)$(br)• Half Rune of the Orb bonus (LP efficiency)$(br2)$(animus)When Charged (>=10 mana):$()$(br)• Acceleration bonus (faster processing)

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: The Rune of Unleashed Nature provides two tiers of bonuses:$(br2)$(blood)Tier 1; Passive Bonuses:$()$(br)Always active, even without mana. Provides capacity boost and half the effectiveness of a Rune of the Orb for improved LP drain efficiency.$(br2)$(animus)Tier 2; Active Bonuses:$()$(br)When the rune has at least 10 mana, it additionally acts as an Acceleration Rune, significantly speeding up altar processing.

pages.title: Mana Consumption
pages.text: The rune consumes mana at a steady rate:$(br2)$(will)Consumption Rate:$() 10 mana per second (configurable)$(br)$(animus)Internal Buffer:$() 5000 mana capacity$(br)$(blood)Duration:$() ~8 minutes per full buffer$(br2)Connect a Botania mana pool via spark to keep the rune continuously charged. The passive bonuses (capacity and half-orb) remain active even when depleted; only the acceleration bonus deactivates.

pages.title: Synergy & Strategy
pages.text: This rune excels when combined with:$(br)• $(animus)Mana generation flowers$() for sustainable power$(br)• $(blood)Other acceleration runes$() for extreme speed$(br)• $(will)Capacity runes$() for massive LP storage$(br2)The dual-bonus system means you get value even during mana shortages, while full uptime provides unmatched altar performance. Perfect for high-throughput automation setups.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: Mana consumption can be adjusted in the server config:$(br2)$(will)unleashedNatureManaDrain:$() Mana consumed per second (default: 10, range: 1-1000)$(br2)$(blood)Requirements:$()$(br)• Both Blood Magic and Botania must be installed$(br)• Must be placed as part of a valid altar structure$(br)• Can receive mana from sparks like any Botania mana receiver
